::Spears:;

She turned and ran down the hall after Prebon.  "WAIT!"  She cought 
up with him. "Is there any other way?  I'll gladly trade my life for 
his. But," she fells to her knees and grabbed Prebon's hand,"let 
Striker go without a chip.  Please let him be free."  tears ran down 
her cheeks. "I..I." she looked down,"I'll do anything to have him go 
unharmed." She then looked back up into Prebon's eyes, "Anything."
She didn't care about her life, she just wanted Striker to go 
unharmed.
